channel.title: Opencv on Ponte Posterum
channel.description: Recent content in Opencv on Ponte Posterum

item.title: C++ 2
item.description: C++ ~ OpenCV OpenCV is a library that I will be working with in C++, so this blog is going to be dedicated to installing OpenCV and setting it up for C++. The steps I will be following are the ones found on the linux tutorial section of the OpenCV website. To start, we need to install the following dependancies. sudo apt install build-essential \ cmake \ git \ libgtk2.
